LanguageData.OCC_BlastShreddedArmor.label: shredded armor
LanguageData.OCC_BlastShreddedArmor.description: Temporary armor reduction after receiving Blast damage.
LanguageData.OE_UnstableToxins_Poison.label: unstable toxins
LanguageData.OE_UnstableToxins_Poison.description: Poisoning with unstable toxins. Causes random negatives or positives side effects.
LanguageData.OE_QueenDeathCry.label: queen's death cry
LanguageData.OE_QueenDeathCry.description: Upon death, the Arachna Queen releases a final surge of energy, creating a debilitating effect on all nearby. This aftermath weakens the working efficiency of those exposed.
LanguageData.OE_MonarchidDeathCry.label: monarchid's death cry
LanguageData.OE_MonarchidDeathCry.description: Upon death, Monarchid releases a final cry, scattering its pheromones. Surprisingly, these pheromones have a positive effect on those who come into contact with them.
LanguageData.OMG_NecrobaneVenom.label: necrobane venom
LanguageData.OMG_NecrobaneVenom.description: This venom weakens a target’s defenses, increasing incoming damage. Its effects intensify as more accumulates, making the target progressively more vulnerable.
